mapper.select: SELECT c.concertNum, c.concertName, c.host, c.supervise, TO_CHAR(concertStart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') concertStart, TO_CHAR(concertEnd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') concertEnd, h.hallName, c.genre, seatPriceList FROM concert c JOIN concertHall h ON c.hallNum=h.hallNum WHERE concertNum=#{concertNum}
SELECT seatLevel, concertNum,seatPrice FROM seatPrice sp JOIN seatLevel sl ON sp.seatLevelNum=sl.seatLevelNum where concertNum=#{concertNum} ORDER BY sp.seatLevelNum
SELECT SUM(total) FROM orders o JOIN bookConcert b ON o.approveNum=b.approveNum JOIN concert c ON b.concertNum=c.concertNum WHERE c.concertNum=#{concertNum}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM concert c JOIN bookConcert b ON c.concertNum=b.concertNum JOIN orders o ON b.approveNum=o.approveNum WHERE b.concertNum=#{concertNum}
